MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL26 postcode area of Llanrwst, affecting properties in Maenan and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00Pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:55PM on 31st October 2020.
